name: BToolTip
desc: BToolTip lets you add tooltips to components easily.

infoArray.name: children
infoArray.desc: The children element to supply to the tooltip.

infoArray.name: style
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the tooltip element.

infoArray.name: tooltip
infoArray.desc: Can be used to pass a content element as the content for the tooltip.

infoArray.name: tooltipPosition
infoArray.desc: The vertical and horizontal positions, respectively, of the element's tooltip. Possible values are: 'down', 'up', 'right', 'left'. Default is 'up'.

infoArray.name: tooltipStyle
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the tooltip element.
